Command.name: /warn
Command.description: Throws a new warning message popup based on a TNNW code.

Parameter.name: code
Parameter.description: A string of length 3, with the hexadecimal assosiated with the error type, where UNKNOWN = 0, CONNECTION = 1, ASSET = 2, SERVICE = 3, ADMIN = 5, USER = 6, followed by the error id.

Command.name: /noitems
Command.description: Empties the given player's inventory of all items.

Command.name: /clock
Command.description: Logs the time, lag estimate, lag offset and client-server clock difference.

Command.name: /clock
Command.description: Runs a given action on the client clock.

Parameter.name: action
Parameter.description: The action to perform on the clock.

Option.name: up/upd/update
Option.description: Updates the clock or its timer based on the second parameter.

Parameter.name: argument
Parameter.description: The argument for the update action.

Option.name: start
Option.description: Runs the start update timer method.

Option.name: stop
Option.description: Runs the stop update timer method.

Option.name: now
Option.description: Runs the update clock method.

Option.name: off/offset
Option.description: Updates the current lag offset with the second parameter.

Parameter.name: argument
Parameter.description: The argument for the offset action.

Option.name: newoffset
Option.description: The integer value to set the lag offset to.

Command.name: /quality
Command.description: Sets the quality level of a graphical setting.

Parameter.name: settingname
Parameter.description: The quality setting you wish to modify.

Option.name: setting
Option.description: The global quality level.

Option.name: object
Option.description: The object quality level.

Option.name: animation
Option.description: The animation quality level.

Option.name: vfx
Option.description: The visual effect quality level.

Option.name: decoration
Option.description: The decoration quality level - note: either on or off, does not take an quality level.

Parameter.name: argument
Parameter.description: The argument for the decoration action.

Option.name: on
Option.description: Turns decorations on.

Option.name: off
Option.description: Turns decorations off.

Parameter.name: qualitylevel
Parameter.description: The quality to set the setting to - note: decoration has its own parameter.

Option.name: fastest
Option.description: The fastest quality level.

Option.name: fast
Option.description: The fast quality level.

Option.name: simple
Option.description: The simple quality level.

Option.name: good
Option.description: The good quality level.

Option.name: beautiful
Option.description: The beautiful quality level.

Option.name: fantastic
Option.description: The fantastic quality level.

Parameter.name: commandname
Parameter.description: The name of the jabber command to run.

Option.name: ping
Option.description: Sends ping message to a specific jabber.

Parameter.name: to
Parameter.description: The jabber id to send the ping to.

Option.name: pingall
Option.description: Sends ping message to all jabbers.

Option.name: message
Option.description: Sends a message to a specific jabber.

Parameter.name: message
Parameter.description: The message to send to the jabber.

Parameter.name: to
Parameter.description: The jabber id to send the message to.

Option.name: messageall
Option.description: Sends a message to all jabbers.

Parameter.name: message
Parameter.description: The message to send to the jabbers.

Option.name: createroom
Option.description: Creates a room via the jabber.

Parameter.name: roomname
Parameter.description: The room name to create.

Option.name: joinroom
Option.description: Joins a room via the jabber.

Parameter.name: roomname
Parameter.description: The room name to join.

Option.name: memberlist
Option.description: Lists the members via the jabber.

Parameter.name: roomname
Parameter.description: The room nama to query users from.

Option.name: leaveroom
Option.description: Leaves a room via the jabber.

Parameter.name: roomname
Parameter.description: The room name to leave.

Option.name: forceconnect
Option.description: Forces a jabber to connect to a server.

Parameter.name: username
Parameter.description: The username for the connection.

Parameter.name: server
Parameter.description: The server to connect to.

Parameter.name: msgport
Parameter.description: The message port for the connection.

Parameter.name: securityport
Parameter.description: The security port for the connection.

Option.name: exit
Option.description: Closes the connection of the jabber.

Option.name: setressource
Option.description: Sets a resource via the jabber.

Parameter.name: resourcename
Parameter.description: The name of the resource to set.

Option.name: addroster
Option.description: Adds a player to the roster via the jabber.

Parameter.name: playername
Parameter.description: The name of the player to add.

Option.name: removeroster
Option.description: Removes a player from the roster via the jabber.

Parameter.name: playername
Parameter.description: The name of the player to remove.

Option.name: updateroster
Option.description: Updates a player in the roster via the jabber.

Parameter.name: playername
Parameter.description: The name of the player to update.

Option.name: subscribe
Option.description: Updates a player's subscription preference via the jabber.

Parameter.name: playername
Parameter.description: The name of the player to update.

Parameter.name: message
Parameter.description: The subscription preference message.

Option.name: unsubscribe
Option.description: Unsubscribes a player via the jabber.

Parameter.name: playername
Parameter.description: The name of the player to unsubscribe.

Option.name: acceptsubscribe
Option.description: Accepts a player's subscription via the jabber.

Parameter.name: playername
Parameter.description: The name of the player to accept the subscription of.

Option.name: refusesubscribe
Option.description: Refuses a player's subscription via the jabber.

Parameter.name: playername
Parameter.description: The name of the player to refuse the subscription of.

Command.name: /popup
Command.description: Tests the fullscreen popup for the marketplace.

Command.name: /event_xmas
Command.description: Sets the current event to christmas.

Command.name: /event_none
Command.description: Sets the current event to nothing.

Command.name: /selv
Command.description: Sets the effect level for the current player.

Parameter.name: effectlevel
Parameter.description: An integer representing the effect level to set to.

Command.name: /addaccess
Command.description: Completes the starter quests for each tribe.

Command.name: /prog3
Command.description: Levels the user up to level 3, including a slingshot, sword, armor and an apple.

Command.name: /prog5
Command.description: Levels the user up to level 5, including 1000 bananas, both slingshots, a sword, armor, earrings, clothes, banana-bits, and a healing potion.

Command.name: /prog10
Command.description: Levels the user up to level 10, including 3000 bananas, gadgets, a slingshot, a sword, armor, buffs, and clothes.

Command.name: /prog12
Command.description: Levels the user up to level 12, including 4000 bananas, gadgets, a slingshot, a gun, a sword, armor, buffs, and clothes.

Command.name: /prog15
Command.description: Levels the user up to level 15, including 5000 bananas, gadgets, a slingshot, a gun, a sword, armor, buffs, and clothes.

Command.name: /prog20
Command.description: Levels the user up to level 20, including 8000 bananas, all ingredients, gadgets, the scrying orb, healing staff, a slingshot, a gun, food, armor, buffs, and clothes.

Command.name: /prog25
Command.description: Levels the user up to level 25, including 10000 bananas, all ingredients, gadgets, the scrying orb, healing staff, snake staff, a slingshot, a gun, food, armor, buffs, and clothes.

Command.name: /prog30
Command.description: Levels the user up to level 30, including 10000 bananas, all ingredients, gadgets, the scrying orb, healing staff, snake staff, a slingshot, a gun, food, armor, buffs, and clothes.

Command.name: /prog40
Command.description: Levels the user up to level 40, including 40000 bananas, all ingredients, gadgets, the scrying orb, healing staff, snake staff, heroism ability, a slingshot, a gun, armor, and clothes.

Command.name: /prog50
Command.description: Levels the user up to level 50, including 40000 bananas, all ingredients, gadgets, the scrying orb, healing staff, snake staff, heroism ability, a slingshot, a gun, armor, and clothes.

Command.name: /prog60
Command.description: Levels the user up to level 60, including all ingredients, all gadgets, armor, and clothes.

Command.name: /addfriend
Command.description: Adds a friend to the player.

Parameter.name: friendname
Parameter.description: The name of the friend to add.

Command.name: /trade
Command.description: Initializes a trade with a player.

Parameter.name: monkeyname
Parameter.description: The name of the player to invite to trade.

Parameter.name: summary
Parameter.description: A word identifying the bug.

Parameter.name: detail
Parameter.description: A sentence detailing the bug in question.

Command.name: /add
Command.description: Adds an item to the player.

Parameter.name: itemid
Parameter.description: The id of the item to add, alternatively 'petbattlepoints'.

Parameter.name: amount
Parameter.description: The amount of the item to add.

Command.name: /addkeys
Command.description: Adds all trail keys to the player.

Command.name: /exist
Command.description: Checks to see if an object exists in the scene.

Parameter.name: objectid
Parameter.description: The id of the game or scene object to check exists in scene.

Parameter.name: xvelmultiplier
Parameter.description: The multiplier to the x velocity.

Parameter.name: yvelmultiplier
Parameter.description: The multiplier to the y velocity.

Command.name: /cheatcollision
Command.description: Disables the collision for the player for any terrain colliders.

Command.name: /housingsetnode
Command.description: Sets the housing's item for a node.

Parameter.name: path
Parameter.description: The path node for the housing to set.

Parameter.name: itemid
Parameter.description: The item id to set the path's node to.

Parameter.name: path
Parameter.description: The path node for the housing to delete.

Command.name: /teleport
Command.description: Teleports a player to a given position.

Parameter.name: x
Parameter.description: A float detailing the x position.

Parameter.name: y
Parameter.description: A float detailing the y position.

Parameter.name: plane
Parameter.description: Either the front 'F', or back 'B' plane.

Parameter.name: fpstest
Parameter.description: The FPS, as an integer, to test at.

Parameter.name: profilerargs
Parameter.description: The arguments to the profiling manager.

Parameter.name: profilerargs
Parameter.description: The arguments to the profiling manager.

Parameter.name: profilerargs
Parameter.description: The arguments to the profiling manager.

Command.name: /sfslog
Command.description: Sets the log level for the server manager.

Parameter.name: loglevel
Parameter.description: The level of severity for the log.

Option.name: trace
Option.description: TRACE SEVERITY

Option.name: debug
Option.description: DEBUG SEVERITY

Option.name: info
Option.description: INFO SEVERITY

Option.name: warning
Option.description: WARNING SEVERITY

Option.name: error
Option.description: ERROR SEVERITY

Option.name: fatal
Option.description: FATAL SEVERITY

Command.name: /addgrenades
Command.description: Adds all grenades to the player.

Parameter.name: itemcount
Parameter.description: The amount of grenades to add.

Command.name: /allcrafting
Command.description: Adds all craftable items to the player.

Parameter.name: itemcount
Parameter.description: The amount of craftable items to add.

Command.name: /allquestitems
Command.description: Adds all quest items to the player.

Parameter.name: itemcount
Parameter.description: The amount of quest items to add.

Command.name: /allsupplies
Command.description: Adds all consumable items to the player.

Parameter.name: itemcount
Parameter.description: The amount of consumable items to add.

Command.name: /allclothes
Command.description: Adds all clothing items to the player.

Parameter.name: itemcount
Parameter.description: The amount of clothing items to add.

Command.name: /allpets
Command.description: Adds all pets to the player.

Parameter.name: itemcount
Parameter.description: The amount of pets to add.

Command.name: /toggle_acm
Command.description: Toggles the avatar combined mesh system.

Command.name: /test_customization
Command.description: Tests the customization of the paperdoll monkey.

Command.name: /newcompass
Command.description: Toggles the type of compass on screen.

Command.name: /compass
Command.description: Sets the type of compass on screen.

Parameter.name: compassmode
Parameter.description: The compass mode, where the updated compass will set if greater than zero.

Command.name: /setactivequest
Command.description: Sets the active quest for the player.

Parameter.name: questname
Parameter.description: The quest name for the new active quest.

Command.name: /setregister
Command.description: Sets whether the current player is registered.

Parameter.name: isregistered
Parameter.description: An integer to set the registered value to, where 1 is true, 0 is false.

Command.name: /showncpopup
Command.description: Opens the new cash shop item menu.

Parameter.name: chatbubblecount
Parameter.description: The maximum amount of chat bubbles to show on screen at once.

Command.name: /snowlevel
Command.description: Sets the attributes of the current level to snow.

Parameter.name: newlevel
Parameter.description: The weather node to activate.

Parameter.name: testsnowset
Parameter.description: The snow set to test.

Parameter.name: atmospherictestmode
Parameter.description: The atmosphere to test.

Command.name: /itemreceivetest
Command.description: Sets the item recieve test variable.

Parameter.name: itemrecievedid
Parameter.description: The id of the item to recieve.

Command.name: /perftool or /pt
Command.description: Enables or toggles the benchmark tool.

Parameter.name: enablebenchmark
Parameter.description: A boolean of whether to enable/disable the benchmark tool.

Parameter.name: script
Parameter.description: The script to add to the benchmark tool.

Parameter.name: value
Parameter.description: An integer to attribute to the script.

Parameter.name: objtrackmode
Parameter.description: An integer for the mode of tracking for an objective.

Parameter.name: fov
Parameter.description: An integer for the type of FOV tracking, where clear is 1, red is 2, and green is 3.

Parameter.name: cashshopversion
Parameter.description: An integer for the version of cashshop, where new is 1 and old is 0.

Parameter.name: gameobjectid
Parameter.description: The id of the gaem object to debug.

Command.name: /addandcompletequest
Command.description: Adds and sets a quest as completed.

Parameter.name: questname
Parameter.description: The name of the quest to set as completed.

Command.name: /firevideocomplete
Command.description: Sets the intro video as completed.

Command.name: /now
Command.description: Sets the current time to a given parameter or, by default, now.

Parameter.name: time
Parameter.description: The DateTime to parse and set now to, or, to reset, either 'now' or 'reset'.

Parameter.name: color
Parameter.description: The color to set the color blast to.

Parameter.name: mode
Parameter.description: The mode of the chicken zapper.

Parameter.name: interval
Parameter.description: The first interval of the chicken zapper.

Parameter.name: interval2
Parameter.description: The second interval of the chicken zapper.

Parameter.name: commandname
Parameter.description: The name of the ngg command to run.

Option.name: setdev
Option.description: Sets the dev user account.

Parameter.name: to
Parameter.description: The name of the dev user.

Option.name: loadprefab
Option.description: Sets the prefab mode for the HUD window.

Parameter.name: prefabmode
Parameter.description: The prefab mode, as an integer.

Option.name: framerate
Option.description: Sets the target framerate of the application.

Parameter.name: targetframerate
Parameter.description: The framerate for the application to target.

Option.name: monitor
Option.description: Sets the performance tool monitoring setting.

Parameter.name: monitorsetting
Parameter.description: The monitoring mode, as an integer.

Option.name: gcall
Option.description: Runs the garbage collection.

Parameter.name: generation
Parameter.description: The generation of garbage to be collected, as an integer.

Option.name: gcpress
Option.description: Adds memory pressure to the garbage collector.

Parameter.name: bytesallocated
Parameter.description: The number of bytes of memory to add as pressure to the garbage collector.

Option.name: gcunpress
Option.description: Removes memory pressure from the garbage collector.

Parameter.name: bytesallocated
Parameter.description: The number of bytes of memory to remove as pressure from the garbage collector.

Option.name: memaudit
Option.description: Audits the memory of the program.

Option.name: memleak
Option.description: Runs a memory leak in the program.

Option.name: snapshot
Option.description: Snapshots the current memory of the program.

Option.name: diff or diffs
Option.description: Checks the memory diff of the program.

Parameter.name: prefabname
Parameter.description: The suffix of the housing object to load, prefixed by 'PF_HS_'.

Command.name: /la
Command.description: Lists all animatiions for the current avatar.

Parameter.name: name
Parameter.description: The name of the event.

Parameter.name: amount
Parameter.description: The amount to set the event to.

Parameter.name: args
Parameter.description: The arguments to the AchievementCheat command.

Parameter.name: args
Parameter.description: The arguments to the BlackboardCheat command.

Command.name: /8bitmode
Command.description: Opens the eight bit mode menu.

Parameter.name: icontype
Parameter.description: The icon for the toaster to open, defaults to hellow.

Option.name: b
Option.description: (Text Only) Badge Icon

Option.name: a
Option.description: (Text Only) Achievement Icon

Option.name: f
Option.description: (Text Only) Friends Icon

Option.name: i
Option.description: (Text Only) Inventory Icon

Option.name: s
Option.description: (Text Only) Social Icon

Option.name: l
Option.description: (Text Only) Leaderboard Icon

Option.name: g
Option.description: (Text Only) Games Icon

Command.name: /turnin
Command.description: Runs the quest turn in script for the current active quest.

Parameter.name: args
Parameter.description: The arguments to the MigrationCheat command.

Command.name: /notificationprefab
Command.description: Creates and shows a notification from a prefab.

Parameter.name: prefabname
Parameter.description: The prefab to show in the notification.

Parameter.name: monkeyblasttest
Parameter.description: Whether to test monkey blast, as an integer.

Parameter.name: cannonangle
Parameter.description: The cannon angle for the blast, as a float.

Parameter.name: duration
Parameter.description: The duration of the test leaderboard to exist for.

Parameter.name: sleep
Parameter.description: The sleep time before loading the test leaderboard.

Parameter.name: env
Parameter.description: The environment to load the test leaderboard on.

Command.name: /errorreport
Command.description: Triggers the 230 ASSET error report - ASSET_BUNDLE_INVALID.

Parameter.name: scaleval1
Parameter.description: The first value to scale the population to.

Parameter.name: scaleval2
Parameter.description: The second value to scale the population to.

Parameter.name: scaleval1
Parameter.description: The first value to scale the population to.

Parameter.name: scaleval2
Parameter.description: The second value to scale the population to.

Parameter.name: scaleval2
Parameter.description: The third value to scale the population to.

Command.name: /trackphysics
Command.description: Runs the TrackPhysicsEvents command. Defaults to 'track'.

Parameter.name: tracktype
Parameter.description: Whether the player's physics should be tracked.

Parameter.name: args
Parameter.description: The arguments to pass to the PetBattlePetCheat command.

Parameter.name: delayuseminutes
Parameter.description: The minutes to add to the delay use expiry.

Command.name: /socialcontextualmenuv2
Command.description: Toggles the updated social context menu.

Command.name: /socialnotebookv2
Command.description: Toggles the updated social notebook menu.
